build_targets.name: Dashboard
build_targets.notes: 1921 modules transformed. Warning: chunk index-DGriPH4D.js is 594.64 kB (>500 kB limit). Consider code-splitting.

smoke_test.notes: Server started, detected data root, entered proxy mode, registered 5 tools. No crash on load.

data.build_instructions:
Step-by-step build instructions:
1. cd server && npm install && npx tsc (compile server)
2. cd dashboard && npm install && npx vite build (build dashboard)
3. cd vscode-extension && npm install && npx tsc (compile extension)
4. To run server: cd server && node dist/index.js
5. To run dashboard dev: cd dashboard && npm run dev
6. To test: cd server && npm test (1122 tests)
optimization_suggestions: Dashboard JS bundle is 594.64 kB (gzipped: 161.86 kB). Consider using dynamic import() to code-split the application.
Use build.rollupOptions.output.manualChunks in vite.config.ts to improve chunking.
Consider enabling incremental TypeScript compilation for server and extension (composite: true, tsBuildInfoFile).
dependency_notes: All three components compile without dependency errors.
No missing modules or dangling imports detected.
vite v6.4.1 used for dashboard production build.
